author: dreid
msg: Bring mpmt_beos up to date and allow it play nice with mpm_common.

author: rbb
msg: Modify the config order so that we read the config, process all EXEC_ON_READ
directives at the same time, run pre_config hook for all modules, and
then walk the tree.  This allows all modules to have a pre_config hook and
know that it will be called at a reasonable time.  I also made "Include"
an EXEC_ON_READ directive so that it is included in the tree properly.
This was required after the other changes that were made.

author: trawick
msg: mod_cgi: Make ScriptLog directive work again by fixing the
flags passed to ap_open().
TODO: Roll recent mod_cgi logging changes into mod_cgid.

Just a bit of cleanup to the 2.0 language before I crash here.
This is exactly the reason the mpm service update isn't going into the
alpha - big chunks of this must be rewritten first.

author: wrowe
msg: PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:
I imagine everyone who cares recognizes what this implies.  Absent any
objections, the patch to bring the 1.3.x tree up to Visual C 6.0 .dsp
format will be committed on Tuesday night, prior to the 1.3.13 release.
I strongly suggest, however, that we maintain the 5.0 version .mak,
since VC 6 will easily recognize it, and the additional features
offered by the /ZI flag are rather mute for folks who don't work in
the VisualStudio development environment.  And so, 5.0 .mak files will
be regenerated and diffs submitted that evening, as a just-in-case.
